```{r setup, eval = TRUE}
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(ggplot2)
library(bayesplot)
```

## Read stan fit object

```{r}
fitobj <- paste0(params$tproj, "_", params$twindow, ".rds")
fit1 <- here::here("data/stanfits", fitobj) %>%
    readRDS(.)
```

# Rhat: potential scale reduction statistic

```{r rhat}
rhats <- bayesplot::rhat(fit1)
bayesplot::mcmc_rhat(rhats)  + yaxis_text(hjust = 1)
```
# Effective Sample Sizes
```{r neff}
ratios_ne <- bayesplot::neff_ratio(fit1)
bayesplot::mcmc_neff(ratios_ne, size = 2) + yaxis_text(hjust = 1)
```
